rationales.stimulation: He is pulled toward the uncertainty and excitement of the Lisbon opportunity.
rationales.security: That pull conflicts with his stated plan to preserve reserves and slow down.

rationales.stimulation: Repeated founder calls and mental pre-commitment show strong attraction to the new challenge.
rationales.security: He runs downside scenarios and anchors risk against recoverable-loss logic.

rationales.achievement: He keeps evaluating onboarding implications and timelines even during personal time.
rationales.benevolence: He struggles to stay present with Ingrid, splitting attention away from the relationship.

rationales.security: He declines the deal to protect reserves, current rhythm, and portfolio stability.
rationales.self_direction: He deliberately overrides his own thrill-seeking impulse after reflection.

rationales.security: He immediately mobilizes legal and restructuring work to stabilize a major portfolio shock.

rationales.achievement: He executes an on-site turnaround and secures a replacement client under pressure.
rationales.security: He shifts toward diversification and continuity after the anchor-client loss.

rationales.stimulation: He reports ongoing restlessness and craving for a new activating challenge.
rationales.security: He minimizes stable performance as 'treading water,' increasing pull toward destabilizing change.

rationales.hedonism: He intentionally takes restorative leisure with Ingrid and keeps his phone out of reach.

rationales.stimulation: A new drone concept immediately reactivates his exploratory interest.
rationales.security: He checks that impulse against existing portfolio health before acting.

rationales.stimulation: He gets energized enough to model the deal late into the night.
rationales.security: He closes the laptop and delays action to avoid overextension.

rationales.stimulation: He explicitly names missing the feeling of building something from nothing.
rationales.security: He recognizes he is rationalizing another stretch move soon after a major scare.

rationales.self_direction: He chooses a two-week pause instead of reacting impulsively.
rationales.security: He reframes toward a sustainable pace that can protect current commitments while evaluating growth.
